raw_body: Brigadier W.K. NANAYAKKARA – Beloved husband of Indrani, loving father of Lakmin Ranavijaya and Rivindu Ranavijaya (Former GM at Next Li & Fung (Bangaladesh) Union Apparels, Courtaulds Clothing and currently based in Australia). Remains lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour, Lotus Hall. Cortege leaves at 4 p.m. on 29th April for cremation at General Cemetery, Mt. Lavinia. 000001
